custom-meta.meta-value: Viral sequence data are available from the GenBank Nucleotide database at the following accession numbers: KX255061-63 and KX355507, KX355508, KX355509, KX355510, KX355511, KX355512, KX355513, KX355514, KX355515, and KX355516. Epidemiological data are from the Chikungunya surveillance study whose authors may be contacted at Gorgas Memorial Institute (GMI) or Ministry of Health (MINSA). Our epidemiological data cannot be made publicly available for legal reasons (e.g., public availability would compromise patient privacy) by Law 68, 2003 ( http://200.46.254.138/APPS/LEGISPAN/PDF_NORMAS/2000/2003/2003_531_2443.PDF).
